none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on May 25, 2017 Description from Terminal Escape:
Freaked out weirdo synth slogs from a crew of Ohio mutants who seem to have dished out two demos a coupla years back and then just slurked of into the mist. TAPEWORM level outsider vibe on these four cuts, the longest of which clocks in around 1:12 (after the intro). Get it.  WANNA BE SLUGBUGS?
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Hw1S5opZJMY/WSbvmMOpk3I/AAAAAAAAQ-Q/99FGC33ldo8HUpvrcD1t7g_HaLCESd7nACLcB/s1600/Slugbugs%2Binside.jpg

seo.title: Slugbugs - Wanna Be Slugbugs? demo 2015 - Terminal Escape
